_source.text: 1:37 into the extra period, young Brandon Pirri came through in the clutch, scoring his second goal of the night and third of the year, powering the Engineers to avoid what would have been a depressing tie, but the loss of a 2-goal lead with under 10 minutes to play remained worrisome - slightly better than a Pyrrhic victory.
